Source: Randomize instance order during join for test clients. This helps uncover bugs by approximating the behavior of real clients & servers, where the order of instances will change over time as more players join. Randomization may slightly increase join time bandwidth usage compared to real client-server joins.
en-us: Randomize instance order during join for test clients. This helps uncover bugs by approximating the behavior of real clients & servers, where the order of instances will change over time as more players join. Randomization may slightly increase join time bandwidth usage compared to real client-server joins.
